document_data.name: Aluwand
document_data.Geography: In relation to the surface world, Aluwand was located roughly {{SI|10|mile|long=yes}} east of [[the Scar]],<ref group="note" name="depth">The kingdom of Selu'Maraar is stated to reside {{SIrange|170|250|ft|long=yes}} beneath the waves of the Dragon Reach. This would put it in the Gloom level of the Inner Sea's ocean depths, which is stated on page 39 of ''Sea of Fallen Stars'' to be in the {{SIrange|150|300|ft|long=yes}} range.
document_data.Government: This city was the seat of power for the ruler of Selu'Maraar, who held the classical [[Faerûn|Faerûnian]] [[elf]] title of [[Coronal]].
document_data.History:
Aluwand was constructed around {{Yearlink|713}} by refugees of [[Cormanthyr]], who had transformed themselves into sea elves through use of the artifact known as the ''[[Sashelan Glass]]''. It later became incorporated into Selu'Maraar, but would not become its capital until much later.

Following the end of the disastrous [[Eleventh Serôs War]] the Thuvys clan was ousted from power in Selu'Maraar and the capital was moved to Aluwand. The title of Coronal was then adopted and [[Aolis Ildacer II]] was crowned as the kingdom's first coronal.

After the [[Twelfth Serôs War]], the city was filled with a sense of unease as the Coronal [[Semphyr Ildacer]]'s must valuable agents, the [[elven high mage]]s of Serôs, left him to join the [[Nantarn Council]]. Paranoid at what might happen in the future, Aluwandans began preparing themselves for a potential future conflict.
